dt-api.name: columns().header()
dt-api.summary: Get the header node for the selected columns.

type.description: Get the header `dt-tag th` / `dt-tag td` cell for the selected columns.
type.parameter: This parameter can be used to control which row in the `-tag thead` the header cell will be read from. If empty DataTables will use the primary header cell (`-init orderCellsTop`).
type.returns: DataTables API instance with header cells for the selected columns in the result set.

dt-api.description:
This method can be used to obtain (and therefore modify) the header cells used for multiple columns. This may be made up of `dt-tag th` and / or `dt-tag td` elements depending on the HTML for your table.
The cells returned are the ones used by DataTables for adding the ordering click listener - i.e. one cell for each column that was matched by the selector. If you have multiple cells in a header (i.e. multiple rows), which one DataTables uses as the primary header cell is defined by the `-init orderCellsTop` option.
